Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Authorizes Carl Spatola to receive a refund from the New York state teachers' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Carl Spatola to receive a refund from the New York state teachers' retirement system due to overpayment.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing Carl Spatola to receive a refund from the New York state teachers' retirement system
